oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Boyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 19; East; 10; 10.0x30.0; *Can't find the deed, but according to the Platt book this lot belongs to Boyd. Transcriber's note: burials 4-8 aren't buried there but have stones. See card and series of documents.; Burlington, John 1804-1861; Hollingsworth, Eliza 1818-1839; Hollingsworth, Fanny 1766-1858; Boyd, Ida Creighton 1899-1982; Dale, Dorothy Boyd 1920-1999; Drake, Alex M. 1907-1993; Drake, Mary Edith Smith 1912-1979; Drake, Douglas
